There's bad thn worse then there's sultan dine's app service. Absolute trash. Placed order at 11:30,was granted at 12:18 and said that the order will be delivered by 1:30. Then the app showed that my food is ready and the delivery is on its way and provided me the number of the delivery man. After 10 mins I contacted the delivery boy and he said me the food wasn't ready yet.
